extendedInfo.description: Alien is falling love with the apple. In each stage, apple is hidden behind obstacles. Alien needs your help, with the great power of the cannon, to reach the apple finally! How to play?# Tap screen to shoot alien.# Cannon power and angle depends on the touch point. # Pass level if alien reaches the apple successfully.# More than 400 challenging levels. # Many themes: Mechanical Tree, Beach Fairy table, Snow Odd, Moon Time, Space Walk, Sax City.# The less aliens you shoot, the more coin rewards you get. Even more levels are coming soon!==========================Droidhen is the name behind Defender, Defender II, Dinosaur War, Miracle City, Basketball Shot, DH Texas Poker, Gun of Glory, Shoot the Apple and many other top popular games. Droidhen is also marked as top developer by google.==========================

reviews.title: Interesting!
reviews.comment: A real challenge,addictive,entertaining,fun! A great one!
reviews.author: Tesya Medina

reviews.title: great game on samsung 10.1
reviews.comment: excellent graphics and hours of fun for the whole family, i love this game as it requires some skill to shoot the apple. thanks so much for a great game and also for making it free, what more could you want, get it now!!!!!!
reviews.author: Richard Cook

reviews.title: Addicting!! Love it!!!
reviews.comment: I love this game!! It\'s awesome that there are so many levels... entertainment for days!!! :)
reviews.author: Stephanie Ferrantino

reviews.title: Score won\'t save
reviews.comment: Fun game but my score doesn\'t save. If I leave the game I have to start at the beginning each time. That makes anything more than level 1 useless. It would be nice if they could fix it.
reviews.author: Charlie Lowell

reviews.title: Good simple fun
reviews.comment: I downloaded this game soon after it was released, and I finished it fairly quickly. I was thinking about uninstall, but they kept adding more levels! I was very surprised with the commitment to the game, and I enjoyed playing the last level. Thanks!
reviews.author: Tim Storm

reviews.title: Developers sold out at our expense.
reviews.comment: 5 empty updates,  50 megs of nothing.  It obvious now,   your downloads have spiked over the last few days... making it look like your game has been downloaded 5 times more than it really has.  It\'s called cheating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant addictive game
reviews.comment: Some levels lot easier than others but fun and a great way to lose lots of hours without realising - very addictive!
reviews.author: Anne Marshall

reviews.title: Bingo ;)
reviews.comment: Bingo i\'ve completed 1st stage, opening 2nd blocked stage. Marvellous game. 5 star...
reviews.author: Fun Ainol

reviews.title: Mental exercise wid fun
reviews.comment: Nice game, gives you mental brush up with fun. I liked it
reviews.author: Ankit Gupta

reviews.title: kay
reviews.comment: i have uninstalled this game 3 times now then installed again cuz i think its 1 of the best games i have played i have waited over 5  months on an update so i will try once more if i domt get am update this time then i wont install again cum on people ur takin the p*** now wheres the updates and no empty 1s plz r u gona update plz plz luv  this game gona give it a few more days b 4 i uninstall if i dont get update by 2 nite gona uninstall
reviews.author: kay mcknight

reviews.title: Blatant Commercialism
reviews.comment: The incessant promos for AssBook and the constant attempts to sell worthless game aids is incredibly tedious.
reviews.author: William Smith

reviews.title: I love this game
reviews.comment: Addictive, imaginative, creative,  never gets boring, very cleverly made :)
reviews.author: Kate Dowding

reviews.title: Very cute game!
reviews.comment: I love the graphics! Shoot the apple is my favorite game. I play it over and over and over! You get the picture.  Hahahaha! Thank you creator.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best game ever.
reviews.comment: Cute n very challenging game,makes everyone try to solve every level,shoot the apple will always my favourite game.
reviews.author: Ha Hee

reviews.title: ADD MORE LEVELS
reviews.comment: Developer, pls add more levels...One and only game for me. So addictive, really a great time-pass !
reviews.author: Sath Rayan

reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: Reminds me of an angry birds style shooting game but endless unique ways of reaching the target. I like playing the same levels over and over again. A couple levels stumped me and got me discouraged until i figured out how to pass them. Like the physics of shooting the projector (alien)! Would definitely recommend
reviews.author: Deb Riddle

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is an awesome game. I\'m amazed at how many people complain about there not being enough levels are you kidding there 500+ and its free. Stop your whingeing. I love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Fun
reviews.comment: Each new level is more challenging but not frustrating. Have to think out proper steps to succeed & tear myself away to recharge batteries.
reviews.author: Lisa Harvey

reviews.title: The best critical thinking game there is!
reviews.comment: If you love a challenge, try this.  Only one problem... had it and it disappeared so had to reinstall and start all over.  It\'s the best game ever.
reviews.author: A Google User
